title: How Do I Turn-off the Default Mic When a Bluetooth Mic is Connected?
content: How can I turn off the default microphone when I have a bluetooth microphone connected? The default, internal microphone picks up noise and I'd like to use only a bluetooth microphone. I have seen posts about giving permissions to external microphones but not about using only the external microphone. There are no relevant settings either. Please help.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
